website_summaries.verdict: With solid build quality, a versatile convertible design, an IPS touch screen, full-size media ports, and strong performance, the Acer Chromebook R 11 still manages a very affordable price.
pros: Intel Celeron processor and 4GB of memory provide speedy performance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Far better than a laptop....it turns on and is ready to go in seconds!!
customer_reviews.author: tricky

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine if you just want to browse the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine if you just want to browse the web, shop or stream its probably best for teenagers very light weight and great battery life so perfect for university goers I found it quite hard to navigate but soon got the hang of the os operating system
customer_reviews.author: Sawyerr

customer_reviews.title: An option for the way the internet will be in the future.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a low-cost pc that I could carry easily and use to code. This product is more geared to browsing the internet and cloud storage. It's a great product for what Google predict the future of the internet to be, but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Akim

customer_reviews.title: very pleased very good value for money wish l had purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: very pleased very good value for money wish l had purchased 2 as i am golng to buy one for my wife
customer_reviews.author: john bayliss

customer_reviews.title: Good for son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he's pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob101

customer_reviews.title: Super quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super quick delivery, very well packaged. This item showed no sign of use, can believe how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Google Play Store installed
customer_reviews.text: New generation Chromebook, System Google chrome OS. Google Play Store installed, we can download apps
customer_reviews.author: JianNan H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best buy i did for a long time. Great mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great item, great price, love it thankyou. fast delivery too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Staggeringly good Chromebook for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Its an absolutely fantastic Chromebook!! way better than my last one. beautiful bright HD scree, good battery life and tablet mode is rather handy too. not all the apps from the apps store will install on the chromebook but it is still in beta so i should really expect that. managed to get it with £78 off as i bought it as a amazon warehouse deal. me and my kids love it, it will be my main device from now on!
customer_reviews.author: OBi-D

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It’s for my granddaughter first laptop she’s had it’s seems to be ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my fiance she is over the moon with it
customer_reviews.author: JAMES ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little laptop. Great price on the sale of £150 which is nothing for the latest touchscreen chromebook. The screen is lovely, synced up and runs well. Keyboard is good, not flimsy or sticky like others I have tried recently. This is the 3rd Chromebook i have bought recently for myself and the kids, they are long lasting and if you are aware of how they operate, you will not be disappointed. You can get Google Play and download android apps on this which is fairly new and seems to work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Acer R11 CB5-132T Brilliant chrome notebook!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and a 'deal of the day' purchase it has proved to be great value for money. The Acer R11 CB5-132T is easy to use (although I do keep forgetting it is a touch screen when I'm showing my husband how to use it!), light to carry and very versatile, changing from a laptop to a tablet with ease. My one regret is not buying one for my daughter when it was 'deal of the day'.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine101

customer_reviews.title: but the quality of screen and keyboard is good, the trackpad is accurate
customer_reviews.text: To get in at this price there are going to be compromises, but the quality of screen and keyboard is good, the trackpad is accurate. Had to turn off tap-to-click as it was sending unwanted clicks from my palm while typing and there's no way to disable to trackpad even though a usb mouse is connected. The versatility of tent and tablet mode is great, but I have had difficulty with the on-screen keyboard activating unwantedly in laptop mode.
customer_reviews.author: mac100

customer_reviews.title: Really rather good!
customer_reviews.text: It's really good. I open it up and bingo it's ready. The touchscreen is great. The keyboard is a touch too small if I'm being picky but the keys are solid and you know that you've pressed them. It's brand new so battery life is great. And it doesn't get hot! I was unsure at first as it's not a proper laptop but it does everything that I want it too. Web. University work. Household accounts. Yes get one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sized book
customer_reviews.text: Good sized book. Good battery life approx 10 hours normal use. keyboard a lttle short on keys and no users manual to tell you how to compensate by combining some keys. Touch screen and keyboard work well together and can speed up your projects.
customer_reviews.author: jonty

customer_reviews.title: such as favourite websites and photographs
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook has surpassed my expectations. Why? Because it has picked up most of my data, such as favourite websites and photographs, from the previous Chromebook that died on me after 5 years. So immediate set up including a wireless link to my printer. Added value is also that it has never picked up a virus. Presumably because it has no hard drive as such.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Best value chromebook, has playstore and touch. Just cant beat it. Would like to see the 4gb ram one altough i have no complaits with the 2gb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value chromebook that can function as a laptop, display and tablet. The ability to run android apps (currently limited to the beta channel but wider availability soon) transforms this machine into a great tablet — I personally use android apps on it for things like news and YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great little laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop. 2GB RAM / 16GB SSD version is sufficient for all you basic needs. Net, email, YT, movies, music etc. Don't expect to do any heavy lifting on this thing though. It's not designed for any heavy editing software. Material quality used in the build is good. Good quality plastic/metal case, good keyboard, responsive touchpad and a surprisingly good touch screen. Screen res is in the lower spectrum but it's good enough for a screen this size. Highly recommended if you can get it <200.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: like more than asus opening system and cause I read ...
customer_reviews.text: Welcome to the future To anyone have doubt in chromeos I can say that is really incredible, fast boot and ready to go. Many apps work offline and anyway also win or Mac laptop without connection lost many features. Looking for a chromebook my decision was between acer r11, asus flip and Toshiba. Coming from a convertible my choice is acer for two simple things, like more than asus opening system and cause I read about asus wifi problem. 2 gb isn't a problem for now, chromeos run faster and smooth without lag. Great pad, great touchscreen and keyboard disabled when you're in tablet mode. Love this device. Sorry for my English
customer_reviews.author: daniele

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but uderpowered
customer_reviews.text: I've been working on this Chromebook since yesterday and that's my experience so far. Great things: Touch screen, better than older Acer products. Flips to a tablet mode sort-of which is really nice. Well built. Very negative: Seriously uderpowered. The 2GB of RAM is insufficient for serious tasks, and that makes me wonder what's going to happen when the Android apps come to the Chromebooks. How will this machine handle them? Yes, you can do basic stuff, but if you're planning to use it with 10 tabs open with serious multitasking, forget it. It's a nice toy for a secondary machine, but because of all the above I don't feel comfortable recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Markos

customer_reviews.title: Acer C720 is older, yet mor powerful than the R11. What are you doing Acer?
customer_reviews.text: it's an okay machine, but the specs leave me desiring more. As one of the few chrome books to get initial android apps supported, I am seriously concerned on how the R11 is going to cope. Just with a couple of tabs open, the 2GB RAM is maxed out, even with swap enabled, performance is poor at ALL times. Acer have 4GB ram versions of these R11 devices, but you have to import them from America.... It made me laugh when I compared the C720 to the R11, and found out that the C720 has much better specs and performance overall.... don't waste your money, avoid this device.
customer_reviews.author: Neil E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: Tracpad not working, internet broken, restarting wont help. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Google Drive
customer_reviews.text: 16gb was not enough, states to back up on google drive. Youtube and Google search engine forcing me to accept their terms. Forced to hand over all privacy and security in to the hands of Google, the giant monopolistic firm, by buying these things.
customer_reviews.author: Jem Cakan

product_meta.title: Acer R11 CB5-132T 11.6 inch Convertible Chromebook Laptop (Intel Celeron N3050, 2 GB RAM, 16 GB eMMC, Integrated Graphics, Chrome OS) - White
product_meta.description:
Acer R11 CB5-132T 11.6 inch Convertible Chromebook Laptop (Intel Celeron N3050, 2 GB RAM, 16 GB eMMC, Integrated Graphics, Chrome OS) - White.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Acer Chromebook CB5-132T
User documentation
power adapter
feature_bullets: The 360 degrees hinge features dual-torque technology, so the panel is very easy to open but locks in place when you tap, swipe and pinch on the touchscreen
The Chromebook R11 sports a high quality aluminium top panel that is made even more enhanced with an engraving-like pattern
With the latest MIMO 802.11ac wireless technology under the hood, this Chromebook boasts very fast wireless connection speeds and longer signal ranges
With its sleek 19.2 mm thickness and a light weight of less than 1.6 kg, the elegant Chromebook R 11 is suited for everyday life and beyond
The screen is covered with damage-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass so you don’t have to fret about getting it scratched

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
